Subjects: Passion, carols/songs of; Christ, Passion of
_description: A ‘mourning song’ of the Passion — eleven 6-line stanzas (the lines somewhat disarranged)

TCD155.First Lines:
Ihesu grete loue meued þeTo suffur þe pyne of þi
                    fyre bode…
TCD155.Last Lines:
…þe lord in maiesteIn þi ioyful place
                    Amen
TCD155.Editions:
“Antiquities, Etc.: Hymns of Richard Rolle.” 
             British Magazine and Monthly Register of Religious and Ecclesiatical
                Information
         9 (1836): 499-503: 501-2.
